Original:
CP值蠻高且調酒味道不錯的酒吧!
環境比較偏向美式酒吧，調酒師以及客人也都相當的熱情，還有飛鏢可以打，價格也是相對親民(Gin Tonic 200)，整體來說是師大分部附近相當推薦的酒吧(好像也就這間)

|本日餐點|
Whisky Sour + 無限手套 + 鬼島冰茶。
Whisky Sour中規中矩，不會太酸也不會太甜，威士忌的口感也是相當順。
無限手套基底是啤酒，其餘會混上五杯不同顏色的烈酒(有一杯是生命之水)，口感特別且外觀相當漂亮，將五種酒滑落杯子的瞬間真的很療育!!
鬼島冰茶，基底是海尼根，其他會加入一些烈酒(包括哈密瓜利口酒)，喝起來甜甜的。
整體來說酒喝起來都不錯，調酒師也相當親民! 相當推薦!
EN:
The CP value is quite high and the bartender tastes good bar!
The environment is more enthusiastic about the American bartender, the bartender and guests are also quite enthusiastic, as well as darts to fight, and the price is relatively close to the people (Gin Tonic 200). Overall, it is a very recommended bar near the Normal University. This)

| Meal today |
Whisky Sour + Infinite Gloves + Ghost Island Ice Tea.
Whisky sour is quite satisfactory, it will not be too sour or too sweet, and the taste of whiskey is quite smooth.
The base of infinite gloves is beer, and the rest will be mixed with five glasses of different colors (one cup of water of life). The taste is special and the appearance is quite beautiful.
Ghost Island Ice Tea, the base is Heinen, and others will add some spiritual wine (including cantaloupe liquor) to drink sweetly.
On the whole, the wine is good, and the bartender is quite close to the people! It is quite recommended!
